Description: Part of a painted human coffin, made of moulded plaster painted white and blue, in the form of a left hand, wearing a snake bracelet, with thumb broken.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 162 [119].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
